title: 04/20/2021 - HOUR 1 - Curry, Broncos, Steelers
itunes:title: 04/20/2021 - HOUR 1 - Curry, Broncos, Steelers
description:
Steph Curry is having big games against lousy defenses

The Broncos are most likely moving away from Drew Lock

Mike Tomlin has never lost the locker room


Guest: Michael Vick
